data.enText: a piece of furniture for one person to sit on, with a back, a seat and four legs

data.chText: 在扶手椅里睡着了的老人
data.enText: an old man asleep in a chair (= an armchair )

data.chText: （主持会议或委员会的）主席席位；委员长职位；（会议或委员会的）主席；委员长
data.enText: the position of being in charge of a meeting or committee; the person who holds this position

data.chText: 她主持我们所有的会议。
data.enText: She takes the chair in all our meetings.
Who is in the chair today?
He was elected chair of the city council.
the position of being in charge of a department in a university

data.chText: 他是牛津大学哲学系的系主任。
data.enText: He holds the chair of philosophy at Oxford.

data.chText: 担任（会议、讨论等的）主席；主持（会议、讨论等）
data.enText: to act as the chairman or chairwoman of a meeting, discussion, etc.

means: (主持会议或委员会的)主席席位
担任(会议、讨论等的)主席

example: he was awarded an endowed chair in economics

tr: a seat for one person, with a support for the back
example: he put his coat over the back of the chair and sat down

tr: a particular seat in an orchestra
an instrument of execution by electrocution
resembles an ordinary seat for one person
example: the murderer was sentenced to die in the chair

tr: the officer who presides at the meetings of an organization
example: address your remarks to the chairperson

tr: act or preside as chair, as of an academic department in a university
example: She chaired the department for many years

value.def: A chair is a piece of furniture for one person to sit on. Chairs have a back and four legs.

example.ex: He rose from his chair and walked to the window.
example.tran: 他从椅子上站起来，朝窗口走去。

value.def: At a university, a chair is the post of professor.

example.ex: He has been appointed to the chair of sociology at Southampton University...
example.tran: 他被任命担任南安普敦大学的社会学教授一职。

example.ex: He gave London University £100,000 to establish a chair in Islamic art.
example.tran: 他资助伦敦大学10万英镑，以设立伊斯兰艺术教授一职。

value.def: The person who is the chair of a committee or meeting is the person in charge of it.

example.ex: She is the chair of the Defense Advisory Committee on Women in the Military.
example.tran: 她担任军队女性权益保护顾问委员会主席。

value.def: If you chair a meeting or a committee, you are the person in charge of it.

example.ex: He was about to chair a meeting in Venice of EU foreign ministers...
example.tran: 他将主持在威尼斯召开的欧盟外长会议。

example.ex: The declaration was drafted by a committee chaired by Dr Robert Song.
example.tran: 宣言由罗伯特·桑博士领导的委员会起草。

value.tran: 主持(会议);担任(委员会的)主席

value.def: The chair is the same as the electric chair .
If you are in the chair or take the chair at a meeting, you are the person in charge of it.

example.ex: In the chair was Morien Morgan...
example.tran: 会议由莫里恩·摩根主持。

example.ex: Wheeler took the chair of this sub-committee...
example.tran: 惠勒担任该小组委员会会议主席。

example.ex: Finance Ministers are meeting today in Brussels with Britain in the chair.
example.tran: 财政部部长们今天在布鲁塞尔碰头，会议由英国主持。

trans: 巴斯轮椅(旧时用来推病人或老人)
(通常指海滩上、船上或花园里用的)帆布折叠躺椅
(尤指美国处决犯人的)电椅，电刑
高脚椅(幼儿进食时坐的，带小饭桌)
